definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: The rotor knives are adjusted in a jig outside the machine .
sentences.chinese: 動刀刀具在機外的夾具內調整。

sentences.english: Including jig adjustment device, which can be adjusted in XY direction.
sentences.chinese: 含夾具可調裝置，能在XY方向調節。

sentences.english: Then removed from the clamp and opened at the back to apply the glue.
sentences.chinese: 然後刪除從夾具和後面開膠應用。

sentences.english: The fixturing techniques advanced with the development of the industry.
sentences.chinese: 夾具的發展與製造系統的發展是同步進行的。

sentences.english: Polypropylene is used for standard clamps and Polyamide or Aluminum for special applications.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯是標準夾具和聚酰胺或特殊應用鋁的使用。

sentences.english: Its fixture is designed with characteristic of flexibility, and its leak proof structure is smart as well.
sentences.chinese: 其夾具帶有柔性化設計，防漏結構也較爲巧妙。

sentences.english: This article introduces a series of special clamps for machining pump body of a Shoot Liquid Pump.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了某種射流泵泵體加工的系列專用夾具。

sentences.english: T-slot machine table will allow users to install fixture for various jobs.
sentences.chinese: 形槽狀的機臺方便安裝各種工件需求夾具。

sentences.english: If mass-terminated cables are used, mating receptacles can be mounted at the test fixture.
sentences.chinese: 如果採用接線頭電纜，在夾具上則可以安裝匹配插座。

sentences.english: They can be pre-assembled into a fixture or purchased individually.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以預先安裝到夾具組中或單獨購買。

sentences.english: You can't get specific because the flagstone will act as a jig saw puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你不能得到具體石板將作爲夾具看到謎。

sentences.english: The plan is to provide a drill jig to locate the holes for the new hinges.
sentences.chinese: 圖紙提供一個鑽牀夾具，以爲新的鉸接空定位。

sentences.english: A systematic methodology for automatic planning of modular fixture for dowel-pin system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出孔系基礎板組合夾具設計的系統方法。

sentences.english: USES: Used for making metallic samarium, permanent magnetic materials and electronic devices, etc.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了採用釤鈷永磁鐵的夾具設計方案。

sentences.english: A general-purpose fixture which can match the specific demands of vibration test-bed has been designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種滿足振動臺使用要求的通用試驗夾具。

sentences.english: HRE clamps are designed as hose and tube supports for high cyclic pressure applications.
sentences.chinese: 人權教育夾具設計的軟管和高循環壓力管的應用支持。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
